name: Booma Ball Bob
content:
Booma Ball Bob was a male Weequay residing on Tatooine. He was in charge of the Booma Ball Game and would reward the winner a Kyber brick.
"Booma Ball Bob" first appeared in a side game titled "Shooting Gallery: Booma Ball" in the 2022 non-canonical video game LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga.
